actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgment in favor of the Navajo Tribe of Indians in court of claims case No. 49692, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgment in favor of the Navajo Tribe of Indians in the Court of Claims case numbered 49692.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay a judgment in favor of the Navajo Tribe of Indians in court of claims case No. 49692, and for other purposes.
